title: 3br + Office Sunny Mission Edwardian
posting_body: ['First time on the market in 10 years with a fresh facelift!', ' This sunny top floor Edwardian apartment features period details, 5 enclosed rooms.', 'Could be configured as a 2 bedroom with a very spacious living room or a 3 bedroom by utilizing the beautiful, original pocket doors.', 'There is also a bonus room that is perfect as a home office.', 'At the crest of the stairs you’ll find yourself welcomed with a pair of rooms split by pocket doors, used alternatively as a living room and second bedroom, as a master and living room, or any other combination.', ' The larger room features a bay window and a beautiful, non-working, fireplace.', ' Just off the living room is a window-equipped fainting room, perfectly sized for a full time work from home setup.', 'The hallway leads you to a second, more private bedroom opposite the full bathroom, which features a linen closet.', ' Continue down the hallway to find the kitchen with a large pantry, plenty of space for a breakfast nook, and a dishwasher.', 'Off the kitchen is a room originally intended as a formal dining room, but alternatively usable as a private bedroom.', 'Exit the kitchen to a comfortably sized laundry room / storage room with a washer dryer in it.', 'This corner of the Mission has easy street parking, without sacrificing easy access to Valencia St., Mission St., Calle 24, Bart, Busses, and Tech Busses.', 'Landlord pays water and trash, tenant is responsible for all other utilities (PG&E + Internet).', 'Contact by email or text', 'show contact info', ') to schedule a viewing.', 'Open House: Saturday, 7/30 - 1:00-3:00p']
